title: Disobey the Duke if You Dare, Vol. 1
description: "Once you see who I truly am, this marriage will become far worse."After the death of her second husband, Lily is forced into a third marriage by her father. Her new husband, a duke, is rumored to be a monstrous warmonger, but to her surprise, he turns out to be a kind and thoughtful man. The only catchâ€¦ she must never see his face. Will Lily respect his wishes, or will she disobey the duke?This volume collects episodes 1-12 of the webcomic Disobey the Duke if You Dare.Enjoy the official webcomic of Disobey the Duke if You Dare on Manta app.
author: Manta Comics
